pageTitle: Southern Shores, NC Oceanside Rental | FAIR WINDS
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {118615=Southern Shores Realty 5 Ocean Boulevard Southern Shores, NC 27949 252-261-2000 1-800-334-1000, 31060=Fair Winds is centrally located on the Outer Banks, in Southern Shores. It’s just a quick ride to Duck where you can walk the soundside boardwalk and visit many quaint village shops and eateries. For the more adventurous the Currituck Light House in Corolla is open for climbing daily from late March through November. Or head south to visit the Wright Brothers’ Memorial in Kill Devil Hills, the site of the first powered flight, or Jockey’s Ridge State Park in Nags Head, the largest sand dune on the east coast., 31650=2015 description, 125731=Copyright © 2015 Southern Shores Realty.
